title: Hidden Battles: The Importance of Choosing Kindness
summary: Be kind.  Be gentle.  You never know the silent battles others are currently fighting

title: Glowing Up
summary:
Warning: Very light spoilers for the movie "I Saw the TV Glow. " Keep reading only if you need convincing to see the movie or have already seen it. 
Last night I watched "I Saw the TV Glow" by Jane Schoenbrun for the first time...
